quote_last: . Every time Billy saved a shot he looked heartbroken
title: A Kestrel For a Knave
author: Barry Hines

quote_first: For three decades, time had been frozen at
quote_last: . The story was that the hands had stopped at the exact moment Corcoran O’Connor’s father died. It might have been true.
title: Boundary Waters
author: William Kent Krueger
